unnormalised: Hey guys, interesting discussion on training! Reminds me of when I trained for the Mumbai marathon. Dr. Sharma at AIIMS suggested a regimen focusing on endurance. I was running like, 10 km a day! The new gym near my house, "Fitness First" has a great program. It's like, 2000 sq ft and costs Rs. 5000 per month. What are your thoughts? Any tips on reducing post-workout soreness? Namaste!
